title: News for October 2018
content:

= The dynamic nature of this wiki means that linked pages might get moved, renamed, deleted, or replaced. Old news pages remain as time capsules and are not updated to account for these changes.
[[/div]]

[[module CSS]]
#header h2 span {
    display: block;
    margin: 0;
    padding: 19px 0;
    line-height: 0px;
    max-height: 0px;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: transparent;
    text-shadow: none;
}

#header {
    background-image: url(https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/news-10-2018/SCP-News-2018-10-Logo.png);
}

#header h2 span::before {
    color: #eee;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: #f0f0c0;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #000;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.8);
    content: 'Spooky Correspondence Periodical';
}
[[/module]]


[[size 75%]]This is a series showing off news from the site, articles from the past month[[footnote]] with a rating above 0 [[/footnote]], and fan-content for you to check out and discover! Be sure to leave a comment with your thoughts![[/size]]

++++* Fandom Stuff

* [https://www.reddit.com/r/SCP/comments/9mkms3/hi_this_should_be_the_first_iteration_of_the/?utm_content=title&utm_medium=new&utm_source=reddit&utm_name=SCP SCP-173 Original 4chan post] - This cropped up on reddit this month and caused a bit of a stir, with good reason. As it implies, this is the closest thing we have to original 4chan thread for SCP-173 and some of the other objects. Check it out!
* [[[and-then-i-died-series-2| And Then I Died IV - Series 2]]] - Shaggydredlocks restarted this old game! The premise is simple: someone writes a small entry ending with 'and then I died' featuring a single SCP and you guess what SCP did the killing! If you guess correctly, then it's your turn to write an entry. We're eleven entries in so far and this last one seems to be quite the head scratcher. Go and give it a go!
* [[[SCP International]]] - The International Wiki has teamed up with us to post some of their best articles over the month of October, with the last being posted in November! They have a hub but we've also made a collection of the articles posted at the bottom of this page. Go check it out!

++++* Featured Articles

* [[[SCP-2232]]] ("Birdphone. Think Different."), by minmin, a quick look at Birdphone!â„¢ the next logical step following carrier pigeons.
* [/CryogenChaos-Comment-Tales CryogenChaos' Comment Tales], by, you guessed it, CryogenChaos, A collection of neat gems hidden in the comments of other SCPs.
* In [/the-dark-web-dke79-o2rg5-4jlw6 'The Dark Web' (DKE79/O2RG5/4JLW6)], by drchandra, MC&D make their first venture into the wonderful world of THE CLOUD! 


++++* Event Featured Articles

The theme for the month of October was //Shadow!//

* In [[[SCP-2524]]] ("No Strings"), by tygently, a wax candle has a bit of fun with the Foundation.
* In [[[SCP-1806]]] ("Shadow Sculpture"), by sandrewswann, we see what happens when your shadow crosses over the path of true darkness.
* In [[[SCP-1553]]] ("Dr. Wondertainment's Shadow Paint Play-Set!"), by HammerMaiden, leave shadow puppets behind with shadow paint! (Note: may cause fatigue, vomiting, and fading into the void.)


++++* Contest Recap
[[=]]

[[div style="float:center; margin:0 2em 1em 2em; width:700px; border:0;"]]
|||| [[image https://orig00.deviantart.net/ed63/f/2018/296/e/6/halloween_art_by_hawks_n_coffee-dcq7ebg.png width="600px"]] ||
||||~ Banner made by Alistair Hawks. Check out their [[[hawks-n-artworks|art page!]]] ||
[[/div]]

Click the collapsible to check the contest's rules and entrants!

[[collapsible show="+ Show Contest Recap" hide="- Close"]]


++* HAPPY HALLOWEEN, YOU GASTLY GHOULS AND SPOOKY SKELETONS!
[[/=]]
Another year, another night of partying, trick-or-treating, dark occult rituals, and a contest too! That's right, this year we got in the spirit of the season with a Tale contest. Entrants were required to take two of the following rules and craft a tale within the parameters; 

> * The tale can only have one survivor; how you define that is up to you.
> * The piece itself cannot directly acknowledge that it is, in fact, Halloween, but it must be blindingly obvious based on the setting and story building.
> * One of the characters has to end up in a costume, against their will, to solve some issue that comes up in the tale.
> * The piece must start on Halloween and end during All Saints' Day sunrise.

= Only one would emerge victorious.
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#F6D38B; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
Rounderhouse took the gold with [[[mtf-sigma-5-pumpkin-punchers|MTF Sigma-5: Pumpkin Punchers]]]! Congratulations, Rounderhouse! 
[[/=]]
[[/div]]


= Here are the runner-ups:
[[div style="border:solid 1px #999999; background:#F6D38B; padding:5px; margin-bottom: 10px;"]]
[[=]]
Uncle Nicolini came in second with [[[moon-champion-s-cinco-de-mayo-extravaganza|Moon Champion's Cinco de Mayo Extravaganza]]].

Gabriel Jade earns the final placing spot with [[[let-sleeping-dogs-lie-a-play-in-two-acts|Let Sleeping Dogs Lie, a Play in Two Acts]]]! 
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

Make sure to congratulate the three and check out their tales if you haven't. And of course, make sure to read all the other entries. There are some hidden gems in there.

++++* Editor's Choice

* [[[the-sideways-mountain| The Sideways Mountain]]] - Short, and underappreciated. A lovely poem in an interesting fashion.
* [[[SCP-3604]]] ("Craydaddy") - A delightful romp with a bitter aftertaste.
* [[[new-buteo-series-mechanical-exoskeleton| Anderson Robotics' Installation Guide: Your New Buteo Series Mechanical Exoskeleton!]]]- The first EVER Anderson Robotics GOI format. Plus it's set in End of Death!




----


[[f>toc]]

----

You will notice little 'ðŸ“ˆ' emojis besides some articles. That denotes SCP articles which were under 30 and tales which were under 20 when this edition of site news was posted. Give them a little love! Speaking from personal experience, the most frustrating thing that can happen to an article is not deletion, but stagnating below 20 without any comments. So try to read, vote, and comment on these articles! They're often hidden gems :)

+++ Week of October 1st:


++++ SCPs
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4060| SCP-4060]]] ("Memory Merchant") - "A memory for another." Written by XaiviarNightwing.
* [[[scp-4812| SCP-4812]]] ("Wrath") - "She was fury, she was wrath, she was vengeance." Written by djkaktus.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4516| SCP-4516]]] ("Don't fuck with hyper-religious cats") - A wizard-planet filled with quadrupedal cat-wizards and other quadrupedal thing-wizards. 'Nuff said. Written by The Shrake.
* [[[scp-4384| SCP-4384]]] ("Thunderbird") - "He's a good birb. He's doing his best." Written by Krelavoth and Zyn
* [[[scp-4120| SCP-4120]]] ("A Good Boy") - "He's... also doing his best, but poor boy." Written by Roget.
* [[[scp-4946| SCP-4946]]] ("You Have Died of Dysentery") - UraniumEmpire HAS DIED OF DYSENTERY.
* [[[scp-4149| SCP-4149]]] ("Professor Xorkanoff's Gallery of the Bizz-art") - "One man's trash drawing is a sloth's masterpiece." Written by Rounderhouse.
* [[[scp-4024| SCP-4024]]] ("Puddle in the Gobi Desert") - "Itâ€™s so obvious. Theyâ€™re archetypes. The Hero. The Trickster. The Mother." Written by keyii and TSATPWTCOTTTADC
* "Building underwent structural integrity failure, subject was located crushed under wristwatch." Written by MaliceAforethought. - [[[scp-4096| SCP-4096]]] ("The Ol' Switcheroo")
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-3823| SCP-3823]]] ("Put On Your Red Shoes") - "You ever wonder what those shoes up on power lines are all about?" Written by FMDev.
* [[[scp-4990| SCP-4990]]] ("Queen-Sized Bed") - "A city which may or may not exist, and the bed they may or may not exist under." Written by NatVoltaic.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4102| SCP-4102]]] ("I Have a Bridge to Sell You") - "The Golden Gate Bridge just got a whole lot weirder." Written by softwatch.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4530| SCP-4530]]] ("And Into The Woods We Go") - The Forest listens. The Forest speaks. The Forest takes. But the Forest never gives back. Written by Connor MacWarren.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4223| SCP-4223]]] ("Invasion") - A refugee is of any name and origin. Written by ashburystreet.
* [[[scp-4546| SCP-4546]]] ("Baby You're A Firework") - "COME ON SHOW 'EM WHAAAAAT YOU'RE WOOOOORTH" Written by Weryllium.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-444-j| SCP-444-J]]] ("Tootinâ€™ Dootinâ€™ Shootinâ€™") - "ðŸ”«ðŸŽº" Written by Deadly Bread.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4027| SCP-4027]]] ("Anomalous Dissociative Identity") - A vulture of the mind still requires food. Written by [[[scpcrnp-s-author-page|SCPCRNP]]]
* [[[scp-4309| SCP-4309]]] ("Huddle with Us") - 42 corpses and an abandoned basement college make for the greatest family sitcom every made! Written by DrChandra.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-3837| SCP-3837]]] ("Corn Goblin") - "Things are about to get corny." Written by Baronjoe.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4865| SCP-4865]]] ("Safe safes aren't always safe") - //"The blood emitted a sweet aroma, and was later discovered to contain scents from various air freshening products."// Written by Nacht Geheimnis.
* [[[scp-3604| SCP-3604]]] ("Craydaddy") - "Soundcloud rapper by day, crawfish by day as well. And night. Point is, he's a crawfish." Written by Alces_alces.


++++ Tales
* [[[mugging-the-monster| Mugging the Monster]]] - //"They laughed and got into the car, leaving the zombie's gun on the pavement. They both already had one, after all."// Written by Doctor Cimmerian.

* ðŸ“ˆ[[[the-light-will-attract-the-darkest-of-creatures| The Light Will Attract the Darkest of Creatures]]] - //"And you're still a fucking geek."// Written by DrCaroll.

* [[[foundation-facilities-and-how-to-loot-them| Foundation Facilities, and How to Loot Them]]] - //"Shock didn't know what an SCP-049 was, but she didn't savor the prospect of being stranded in here with one."// Written by Gabriel Jade.
* [[[the-first-sailors| The First Sailors]]] - //"I'd be feeling better about it if there was any chance we'll ever be remembered for being here."// Written by NatVoltaic.

* ðŸ“ˆ[[[breakthrough| Breakthrough]]] - //"We don't have any records of that man working at the Spicy Crust Pizza front, or that they are personnel at all."// Written by Jacob Conwell.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[michael-sends-his-regards| Michael Sends His Regards]]] - //"Next time you get up, Iâ€™ll break yer legs, you government fuck!"// Written by TheManhattenProject.
* [[[chapter-1-opening-credits| Opening Credits]]] - //"So, uh, Dipper, Mabel, how are things?"// Written by Ihp.
* [[[hundred-year-favor| Hundred-Year Favor]]] - //"Still fucking around with dead men?"// Written by Captain Kirby.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[a-letter-to-my-mother| A letter to my mother]]] - //"I just left home underâ€¦ some bad circumstances."// Written by Alces_alces.

++++ GOI Formats
* [[[new-buteo-series-mechanical-exoskeleton| Anderson Robotics' Installation Guide: Your New Buteo Series Mechanical Exoskeleton!]]] - Anderson Robotics //"Should you notice signs of sluggishness or difficulty with senses while participating in an enjoyable activity, please stop enjoying yourself."// Written by OthellotheCat.

* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4148| SCP-4148]]] ("Space Ladybugs") - "To boldly go where no ladybug has gone before." Written by not_a_seagull.

* [[[scp-4455| SCP-4455]]] ("In Shortâ€¦") - "BEHOLD, THE STREAMLINER!" Written by DarkStuff.


++++ Tales

* [[[chapter-2-the-witch-s-hut| The Witch's Hut]]] - //"As usual, the Plastics People were feeding bullshit to the outside world."// Written by Ihp.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[interlopers| Interlopers]]] - No matter how much care they take, a galactic Foundation must take part in galactic conflicts. Written by NatVoltaic.

* ðŸ“ˆ[[[alexandria-burning| Alexandria Burning]]] - //"But they did watch the superpowers. The Eastern Isles had been a superpower, and a nuclear one at that. There were also others. Avalon. The Tundra States. The Western Republic. Atlantis."// Written by GentleGifts.
* [[[eat-your-greenes| Eat Your Greenes]]] - //"WHY CAN'T I FUCK?!"// Written by OthellotheCat.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[industrial-espionage-hf| Fuller & The Factory Funtime Facility, Act II: Industrial Espionage]]] - //"Just next to the Sisyphean Wheel was Mount Tetanus, an enormous pile of sharp, rusty machine parts that patrons were invited to climb."// Written by DrChandra.
* [[[all-that-ails-you| All That Ails You]]] - //"There were no more thoughts, no fears, no joys, only the ever-present, cold nothingness."// Written by Pilzening.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[bare-king| Bare King]]] - //"If you try to stop me, I'll fuse you to your goddamn office chair, do you understand?"// Written by Jacob Conwell.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[dancing-to-the-tune| Dancing To The Tune]]] - //"The Chaos Insurgency was having a very good day."// Written by Stallmantic.
* [[[chapter-3-from-a-burning-screen| From A Burning Screen]]] - //"It was a memeti-pataâ€” cognitâ€” some kind of hazard. One that the director pointedly wanted to ignore."// Written by Ihp.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[of-doctors-and-alagadda| Of Doctors and Alagadda]]] - "An extended stroll will find one with many memories of events they were not there to perceive." Written by Gabriel Jade and Blacknife09.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[in-the-shadow-of-the-anguished-lord| In the Shadow of the Anguished Lord]]] - "I am not sick, no, no, never sick. You! Sick and Crack-ed â€” **Crack-ed**" Written by Gabriel Jade.

+++ Week of October 15th:


++++ SCPs

* [[[scp-4034| SCP-4034]]] ("Defenetre of the Strate") - "Though the window! To the ground! To the pile of dung!" Written by Captain Kirby.
* [[[scp-4225| SCP-4225]]] ("Sammy the Superfluous Serpent, by Sr. Supertainment") - "The first in a line of new Wondertainment Products!" Written by Kothardarastrix.

* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4061| SCP-4061]]] ("Unphotographable") - Gene powered anomalous espionage. Written by XaiviarNightwing.

* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4108| SCP-4108]]] ("Not Really a Catapult") - "Not a trebuchet, either." Written by Riko-based Lifeform.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4314| SCP-4314]]] ("An Irrational Number") - //"SCP-4314 is the irrational number defined as pi (Ï€)."// Written by Kothardarastrix.

++++ Tales


* [[[chapter-4-of-goats-and-sloths-and-flu| Of Goats and Sloths and Flu]]] - //"Agent Tofflemire, the Goatman will beâ€¦ explaining the finer details of this phenomenon to you."// Written by Ihp.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[chapter-5-playing-dress-up| Playing Dress-Up]]] - //"What they failed to realize was that the Hidebehind was capable of hiding in the one place no person can seeâ€” behind their own eyes."// Written by Ihp.
* [[[green-recruit| Ombres Malvants: 3) Green Recruit]]] - //"Flashes of memory came back. A young man crushed down into the form of a squirrel. Pieces of Raf's body, hanging from lampposts. A short man with spiked hair, in a dingy apartment full of boxes."// Written by psul.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[chapter-6-holes-shaped-like-people| Holes Shaped Like People]]] - //"The ability to make a half-decent quip is part of standard agent training. Helps keep morale up when shit hits the fan."// Written by Ihp.
* [[[dr-bright-is-no-longer-allowed-to-use-temporal-anomalies| Dr. Bright Is No Longer Allowed To Use Temporal Anomalies In Order To Travel Back in Time So He Can Kill Hitler]]] - //"Dr. Bright, motherfucker. You told me I couldn't go back in time to kill baby Hitler. Which was bullshit cause I hadn't even told anyone I was considering it."// Written by Doctor Cimmerian.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[chapter-7-s-c-phonies| S & C Phonies]]] - //"Tragedy was something that Site-87, as a whole, was unused to."// Written by Ihp.
* [[[baptism-of-the-wandering-jew-by-johnny-the-son| Baptism of the Wandering Jew by Johnny the Son]]] - //"Usually, things that were cicada were consumed by that which was cicadon't."// Written by UraniumEmpire.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[goc-are-gunfuckers| GOC Agent x Reader (Reader is a Gun) GONE WILD GONE SEXUAL]]] - what. Written by DolphinSlugchugger.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[he-who-laughs-last| He Who Laughs Last]]] - //""You will face the camera and smile at the children if you know what is good for you," threatened Bobble to his prisoner."// Written by DeviantDharma.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[the-sideways-mountain| The Sideways Mountain]]] - We all live upon the mountain's side. Written by guywithahat.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[chapter-8-and-knock-em-down| â€¦and Knock 'Em Down]]] - //"How does a man manage to hide in the ventilation system for two days?"// Written by Ihp.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[chapter-9-set-em-up| Set 'Em Upâ€¦]]] - //"We've managed to tone it down enough that it doesn't cause instant death. Just really, really bad headaches."// Written by Ihp.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[oh-i-wouldn-t-worry-about-flaky-os| Oh, I Wouldn't Worry About Flaky-Os]]] - //"Oh my god, this place has cornflakes made from imaginary corn!"// Written by DrChandra.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[armageddon| Arm-ageddon]]] - //"Armando handed the pure gold arm to the Elder Alchemist, who set it in the middle of the circle inscribed in the sand. The arm glowed, dissolving into pure Aether, and sparkled into the air."// Written by Weryllium.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[industrial-sabotage| Fuller & The Factory Funtime Facility, Act III: Industrial Sabotage]]] - //"Care for some concentrated miasma? Darke sent it as a gift to one of the Foremen, which got him a bit out of sorts since his kind consider gifts a form of socialism. Fortunately, me buying it off him set everything right."// Written by DrChandra.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[chapter-10-movie-night| Movie Night]]] - //"His cover story amounted to 'theater usher with broken fingers'."// Written by Ihp.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[outback-law| Outback Law]]] - //"Oh lord..."// Written by TheManhattenProject.

++++ Misc

+++ Week of October 22nd:



++++ SCPs

* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4992| SCP-4992]]] ("Onions Make Me Cry") - Ash to ash, shallot to shallot. Written by celpha.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4133| SCP-4133]]] ("The Pinup That Doesn't Exist") - The things we become most obsessed with tend to be the things we can't ever achieve. Written by 4esthetics.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4021| SCP-4021]]] ("Tyrfing Cycle") - //"SCP-4021 is a derelict longship composed of tissue similar in composition to Balaenoptera acutorostrata traveling across waters around the North Pole at an average speed of 5 knots."// Written by KindlyTurtleClem.
* [[[scp-3648| SCP-3648]]] ("The Forest Takes All") - What we have all forgotten is the fact that Mother Nature can fight. She just usually chooses not to. Usually. Written by Rounderhouse.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4212| SCP-4212]]] ("A Very Helpful and Clearly-Written SCP Report") - //"SCP-4212 is uncontained. The Foundation is contained but SCP-4212 is free."// Written by excited_occhiolism.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4554| SCP-4554]]] ("Liquid Sunshine") - Drink the sun! High in Vitamin D! Written by Proasek.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4035| SCP-4035]]] ("Prey on Words") - The genie in the lamp-shade. Written by Deadly Bread.
* [[[scp-4713| SCP-4713]]] ("Astromoles") - One small step for mole, on giant leap for mole kind. Written by Calpatus.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4033| SCP-4033]]] ("The Easter Bunny is Dead") - i want to get off of mr bunny's wild ride. Written by guywithahat.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4038| SCP-4038]]] ("The Common Tongue") - Long tongue for long lick. Written by HominiLupus.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-3482| SCP-3482]]] ("You've Been Down Too Long In The Midnight Sea") - Asexual reproduction through regurgitation. Written by ghostpage.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[scp-4110| SCP-4110]]] ("The Ultimate Cosplay") - //"Current goal is to revive the Toys 'R Us brand to recontain the anomaly."// Written by Anorrack.

++++ Tales


* ðŸ“ˆ[[[chapter-11-free-falling| Free Falling]]] - //"Alison Carol awoke, in freefall, to the sight of Robert Tofflemire playing with his phone. Above her, a distinctly unamused Ryan Melbourne was also falling, and let out a beleaguered sigh."// Written by Ihp.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[chapter-12-rock-bottom| Rock Bottom]]] - //"For the last twelve hours, they had slowly been working to retrieve all members of Site-87's staff that were stuck to the walls of the Bottomless Pit."// Written by Ihp.
* [[[coming-out-to-the-woods| I Don't Get It, But I'll Figure It Out.]]] - I would bring down the sun if it meant making you happy.  Written by Uncle Nicolini.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[foundation-under-the-adventures-of-larry| Foundation Under: The Adventures of Larry]]] - Everything changed when scalies started getting jobs at the Foundation. Written by TheManhattenProject.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[chapter-13-12-hours-in-sloth-s-pit-wisconsin| 12 Hours in Sloth's Pit, Wisconsin]]] - "//At exactly 12:00 AM on October 27th, a shadow loomed over Sloth's Pit, Wisconsin.//" Written by Ihp.
* [[[forum-post| Forum Post]]] - Open and honest discussion can backfire, especially when the American public is watching. Written by [[[sexycontainmentprocedures|Cyantreuse]]].
* [[[a-cicada-s-funeral-dirge| A Cicada's Funeral Dirge]]] - A lie in the shape of a truth. A coward in the shape of a man. A cicada in the shape of a god. Written by kinchtheknifeblade.
* [[[digging-up-the-past| Digging up the Past]]] - In a world without death, the past is made more unkillable than before. Written by Gabriel Jade and Uncle Nicolini.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[cafeteria-chat| Cafeteria Chat]]] - You really only get to know someone when you ask them for salt at a cafeteria. Written by keyii.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[a-sensible-use-of-human-life| A Sensible Use of Human Life]]] - //"Fresh from the Waiting Room, ##red|Craggs## had been allocated a temporary office with which to set up. ##blue|Her new --husband-- database administrator## in tow. A ##Purple|site supervisor## peers in."// Written by Lazar Lyusternik.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[psul-001| psul's proposal]]] - "Death. Inescepable." Written by psul.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[chapter-14-family-reunion| Family Reunion]]] - //"The Goatman growled. The Plastic People, like usual, would be of no help"// Written by Ihp.
* [[[numb| I Felt Numb]]] - When reality becomes a rarity it becomes that much more important. Written by Captain Kirby.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[the-night-of-all-the-skeletons| The Night of All the Skeletons]]] - doot. Written by DrDromeus.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[chapter-15-the-doom-that-came-to-theater-six| The Doom That Came To Theater Six]]] - //"But now, the entire audience was strapped to their seats by sets of long, clawed arms that had emerged from the backs of their seat."// Written by Ihp.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[epilogue-roll-credits| Roll Credits]]] - And the Sloth faced the audience and gave a bow. Written by Ihp.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[been-a-while-crocodile| Been A While, Crocodile]]] - //"How did you become likeâ€¦this? You can't just end up becoming a talking crocodile without some story behind it!"// Written by TheManhattenProject.
* [[[consequences-and-collarbones| Consequences and Collarbones]]] - //"Twenty-Seven. There have been twenty-seven attempts on SCP-096's life in the past 6 months. All directed by the man who set him free, Dr. Daniels."// Written by Doctor Cimmerian and SCPILLUSTRATED.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[site-91-halloween-2012| Just this one Halloween nightâ€¦]]] - //"Screw them, it's Halloween, there is nothing wrong about being a monster."// Written by Utylike.
* ðŸ“ˆ[[[industrial-accidents| Fuller & The Factory Funtime Facility, Finale: Industrial Accidents]]] - "//Marvellous? Do you seriously believe The Factory doesnâ€™t know it was you who blew up their theme park?//" Written by DrChandra.

New content has been added to a quite a few artwork pages on the wiki. Here is a short recap:

* [[[drshine-art-page|]]] - Six new pages of Drshine's original comic ("Apotheosis")
* [[[sunny-art-scp-cards|]]] - New tarot cards - "King of Swords: SCP-001 - The Gate Guardian" and "Two of Swords: Incident 239-B - Clef-Kondraki" | [[[https://hisclockworkservants.tumblr.com/|Artist's Tumblr]]]
* [[[sunny-art-series-2|]]] - "SCP-1277 - Thirsty Cactus"
* [[[sunny-art-series-3|]]] - "SCP-2621 - Knocking on Heaven's Door
* [[[zebastian-studios-creators-page|]]] - "Are We Cool Yet? Shirt" in the SCP Merch tab
* [[[brenzan-s-art-dump|]]] - "Bumaro (or any other mekhanite priest)", "scp 076-2", and "how to contain scp 076-2" | [[[https://thelivingtrashcan.tumblr.com/|Artist's Tumblr]]]
* [[[hawks-n-artworks|]]] - Brand new artwork page with works in a few different styles. Be sure to check out the atmospheric Polaroids in the Personal Art section.
* [[[luke-s-artwork|]]] - Luke has been churning out new illustrations all month. He has been exprimenting with color and with making multi-panel comics with stories.
* [[[sexycontainmentprocedures|]]] - New content in the Design/Cosplay tab - latest cosplay, props, phone wallpapers, etc
* [[[crystlon|]]] - Huge update - see the New Pixel Art tab. Tale illustrations added: "Bees", "SCP-????-J", "Thrice", "Quiet Days", "SCP Foundation", and more.
* [[[pastarasta1-s-simply-epic-artpage|]]] - In the SCP Related Art section everything from SCP-081 and down is brand new. That's over 160 new SCP illustrations this month. Simply epic.

[[size 25%]]
+* Q&A:

++* Q: Can I replace a blurb that you wrote for one of my articles with my own? I'm not satisfied with it.

A: Absolutely. You will always have that option at any point.

++* Q: I noticed an error/typo/incorrect information and wish to correct it. May I?

A: Sure! If the changes are not limited to your own article(s) and/or are substantial changes across multiple entries, you should post in that month's discussion page and then make the changes.

++* Q: I wrote an article and it seems to have stuck. Can I send a blurb of mine to one of the frequent collaborators?

A: Yup! It's much easier if you come to us about it, and it gives you the control over what you want shown on the news page.[[/size]]

author: Uncle Nicolini
